intro: Another murder mystery investigated by Agatha Hastings!
description:
Agatha Hastings thought she was leaving the chaos behind when she accepted an invitation to the Thompson estate. 
But the moment she stepped through the door, that illusion shattered, she'd walked right into a murder investigation. 

Behind every polite conversation lurked suspicion. Inheritance, old grudges, secrets kept for generations—none of it added up. And Agatha couldn't ignore the feeling that someone was lying.

As she digs deeper into the family's tangled history, it becomes clear that Charles Thompson didn't die by chance. 
The truth is buried in cluttered rooms and overlooked details, in strained glances and half-spoken words. 
Across 140 immersive clutter levels and 20 bonus puzzle challenges, every hidden object you uncover pulls you further into a mystery that refuses to stay hidden.
Solving the case will take patience, sharp eyes, and a willingness to question everything—and everyone.

- Unravel a chilling murder mystery in the Thompson mansion!
- 140 thrilling "clutter" puzzles to challenge your mind!
- Exclusive bonus: 20 extra puzzles for keen detectives!
- Enjoy relaxing sounds and music masterpieces!
- Every clue brings you closer to the truth... or danger!
